surname Leng

sentences.english: There are two Nobel surprises this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年有兩個諾貝爾獎項爆冷。

sentences.english: Yesterday Slumdog Millionaire was the unexpected winner of the Best Picture Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 昨天《貧民窟的百萬富翁》爆冷贏得奧斯卡最佳影片。

sentences.english: "Honey" won Golden Bear award in Berlin International Film Festival successfully.
sentences.chinese: 《蜂蜜》柏林電影節爆冷成功擒金熊獎。
意大利幾無被爆冷的可能。
